source:
%%sql
Select
    posts._PostTypeId
    ,users._Reputation
    ,min(CreationDate) FirstCreationDate
    ,max(LastActivityDate) LastActivityDate
    ,max(ClosedDate) LastClosedDate
    ,count(ClosedDate) ClosedCount
    ,sum(FavoriteCount) FavoriteCount
    ,sum(CommentCount) CommentCount
    ,sum(AnswerCount) AnswerCount
    ,sum(Score) ScoreTotal
    ,sum(ViewCount) ViewCount
    ,count(1) Posts
FROM raw_stackoverflow.posts
  JOIN raw_stackoverflow.users
    ON posts._OwnerUserId = users._Id
GROUP BY _PostTypeId, _Reputation

%%sql
WITH post_comments (
  Select 
    _PostId,
    count(1) CommentsCount,
    avg(_Score) AvgCommentScore
  From raw_stackoverflow.comments
  group by _PostId
)
Select
    posts._PostTypeId
    ,users._Reputation
    ,min(posts._CreationDate) FirstCreationDate
    ,max(_LastActivityDate) LastActivityDate
    ,max(_ClosedDate) LastClosedDate
    ,count(_ClosedDate) ClosedCount
    ,sum(_FavoriteCount) FavoriteCount
    ,sum(_CommentCount) CommentCount
    ,sum(_AnswerCount) AnswerCount
    ,sum(_Score) ScoreTotal
    ,sum(_ViewCount) ViewCount
    ,count(1) Posts
    ,sum(CommentsCount) CommentsCount
    ,max(AvgCommentScore) AvgCommentScore
FROM raw_stackoverflow.posts
  JOIN raw_stackoverflow.users
    ON posts._OwnerUserId = users._Id
  JOIN post_comments
    ON posts._Id = post_comments._PostId
GROUP BY _PostTypeId, users._Reputation
